references.paper_title: NeRF: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced NeRF, a fundamental technique for novel view synthesis that heavily influenced the field of 3D scene generation and is directly referenced in the CityDreamer4D architecture.

references.paper_title: A style-based generator architecture for generative adversarial networks
references.reason: This work introduced StyleGAN, a highly influential architecture for GANs which is cited as foundational to the approach of generating high-fidelity images in 3D generation.

references.paper_title: SceneDreamer: Unbounded 3D scene generation from 2D image collections
references.reason: This prior work by the authors established many of the core ideas in CityDreamer4D, providing a foundation on which CityDreamer4D builds and improves.

references.paper_title: GANcraft: Unsupervised 3D neural rendering of minecraft worlds
references.reason: This paper introduced a significant advance in generating 3D worlds using GANs, and its architecture directly informs aspects of the CityDreamer4D model.

references.paper_title: CARLA: an open urban driving simulator
references.reason: This paper presented CARLA, a widely used urban driving simulator which is referenced as providing an important resource for evaluation and testing within CityDreamer4D.
